page.title: 11Farmer's year page 3
page.content:
continued from page 5 The farmer's year:
{September:}Sometimes still finishing harvest depending on the weather. As soon as this is done we start ploughing the ground and sowing the grain. {October:}This is the last month cattle are outside.They are stocked lightly all over vacant fields so as not to do too much damage once it turns wet. {November:}Settle cattle into indoor routine, with calves run off into a calf creep. Cows blood tested this month. {December:}With its short days and muggy weather pneumonia is quite often a problem for the calves. General feeding and cleaning out of the animals.
